statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 2 , -6 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 2 , -2 \, x^{3} + 13 \, x^{2} + 11 \, x + 2 , 14 \, x^{3} - 37 \, x^{2} - 32 \, x - 2 , 8 \, x^{3} + 20 \, x^{2} + 16 \, x + 8\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
